Created an attachment (id=30969)
proposed patch for org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.provisional.extensions.breakpoint.NullSourceEditingTextTools

I believe comes from a replacement offset of -1 which is based on the current selection (after having dragOverred a lot).  The current selectio as reported by NullSourceEditingTextTools is always a text empty selection, but it should really just return the text editor's text selection.  Please review and try the attached patch.
Yes, that looked like it fixed the problem.

traces.message: Program Error: modelStateChanging was less than zero
